sen.j: 五辻通（いつつじどおり）は京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Itsutsuji-doori street is one of the streets runing from east to west in Kyoto City.
Itsutsuji-doori street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.
Itsutsuji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 大宮通から西へ、上七軒の北野天満宮東門前の御前通まで。
sen.e: Itsutsuji-doori street runs westward from a point on Omiya-doori street to the point on Gozen-doori street in front of the east gate of Kitano-tenmangu shrine in Kamishichiken.
Itsutsuji-doori street runs westward from a point on Omiya-doori street to the point on Gozen-doori street in front of the east gate of Kitano-tenmangu shrine in Kamishichiken.
Itsutsuji-dori Street runs westward from a point on Omiya-dori Street to the point on Onmae-dori Street in front of the east gate of Kitano Tenmangu Shrine in Kamishichiken.
sen.cmt: "-dori Street"とし、「御前 (おんまえ) 通」の読みの誤りを訂正、Kitano Tenmangu Shrineとしました。
頭文字を大文字に変更、"-dori Street"に修正

sen.e: Kyoto Municipla Karaku Junior High School

sen.cmt: templeの頭文字を大文字に変更
